name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo

Then the object ShortRangeValuesPojo ( shortFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1    shortFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 85    shortFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 42    shortObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1    shortObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 76    shortObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 48    shortFieldWithPreciseValue = 17     ) should not be null
Then the value 1 should be greater or equal than 1
Then the short value 85 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 42 should be between 1 and 1000
Then the object 1 should not be null
Then the value 1 should be greater or equal than 1
Then the object 85 should not be null
Then the short value 76 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the object 48 should not be null
Then the short value 48 should be between 1 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17

title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
